title: Slot
description: A fixed period of time within an epoch.

props.body: Each epoch of time is divided into numbered slots. Slots that are inhabited by blocks are called active slots. One slot equates to roughly 20 seconds in real time. One slot occurs every 20 seconds of real time (under ideal conditions), thus one epoch has a total of 21,600 slots.
